Uses of Class
rr.tool.Tool

  • Packages that use Tool 
    Package Description
    rr.simple  
    rr.tool  

    • Uses of Tool in rr.simple

      Subclasses of Tool in rr.simple 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CountTool
      Count the number of events for most common cases.
      class  EmptyTool
      Like LastTool, but keeps ShadowVar set to thread, so that the fast path in the Instrumenter is triggered.
      class  LastTool
      The last tool in any tool chain.
      class  MethodMonitoringTool
      Super class that adds a decoration to each method indicating whether or not it is "interesting".
      class  PrintTool
      Print a human readable event stream.
      class  SyncTool
      Synchronize all event handling.
      class  ThreadLocalTool
      Identifies thread local accesses and filters them out.

      Constructor and Description
      CountTool(String name, Tool next, CommandLine commandLine) 
      EmptyTool(String name, Tool next, CommandLine commandLine)

      PrintTool(String name, Tool next, CommandLine commandLine) 
      SyncTool(String name, Tool next, CommandLine commandLine) 
      ThreadLocalTool(String name, Tool next, CommandLine commandLine) 

    • Uses of Tool in rr.tool

      Constructors in rr.tool with parameters of type Tool 
      Constructor and Description
      Tool(String name, Tool next, CommandLine commandLine)
      All tools are created by the RoadRunner infrastructure from the command line, based on @Abbrev("...") annotations.
